name: Wspp-stream
tagline: Wrap duplex stream on wspp websocket
body:
# wspp-stream
Wrap duplex stream on wspp websocket

### usage

* create wspp websocket, like var ws = new WebSocket(...)

* then, wrap stream on wspp websocket, like var wstream = new Stream(ws)
